title: Njoku Back On 4-Year Deal
description:
Laura Rutledge, Mike Tanenbaum, Ryan Clark, and Jeff Darlington discuss Patrick Mahomes’ comments on the new look Chiefs offense, the Cowboys rushing situation, and David Njoku signs a 4 year deal with the Browns.
